divs: Sighting Detailsuncle woke up between 3 am and 3:30am seen light above tree tops it lighted area to the point uncle said it was like the sun was out ... he ask me that morning if i had seen it dew to placement of camper it was not visible to me small windows ... also made a statement if they leave me alone i will leave them alone ... this is also the only place i have ever seen anything i could not explain that might relate to the UFO field ... in 2007 i seen a light moving in the the clouds very erratic movements nothing man made would have moved in the way the light i seen moved
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sallisaw
This sighting has never been favorited.
